data.name: ArcheAge: Experienced Hero Pack
data.detailed_description:
The perfect pack for heroes with a bit of experience under their belt! This pack has everything you need to thrive in the wilds of Erenor.

  • 30-Day Patron Access - Grants 20% more EXP, work 20% faster, own land, and more!
  • Expansion Scroll (x3) - Adds 10 slots to your Warehouse or Inventory
  • Bound Worker’s Compensation: 1000 (x3) - Grants 1000 labor
  • Bound Kamari - Ride this fearsome tiger into battle
  • Any-Post Owl (x5) - Summons a mailbox that lasts for 10 minutes
  • Bound Reward Coin (x3) - Trade for past lockboxes on Mirage Isle
  • Character Slot Scroll - Unlocks an additional character slot (max 6 slots per account)
  • Language Proficiency Book - Grants the ability to read and speak another faction’s language for 7 days

data.short_description: The perfect pack for heroes with a bit of experience under their belt! This pack has everything you need to thrive in the wilds of Erenor.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1, Win7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must have at least 1024MB video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Registered Trion Account, Glyph Client, and acceptance of License and Usage terms
